verses.verse: תְּהִלָּ֗ה <S%H8416><s%> te-hil-Lah, [Psalm] of praise לְדָ֫וִ֥ד <S%H1732><s%> le-Da-Vid David's אֲרוֹמִמְךָ֣ <S%H7311><s%> a-ro-mi-Cha I will extol אֱלוֹהַ֣י <S%H433><s%> e-lo-Hai God הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> ham-Me-lech; O king וַאֲבָרֲכָ֥ה <S%H1288><s%> va-'a-va-ra-Chah and I will bless שִׁ֝מְךָ֗ <S%H8034><s%> me-Cha, thy name לְעוֹלָ֥ם <S%H5769><s%> le-'o-Lam for ever וָעֶֽד׃ <S%H5703><s%> va-'Ed. and ever

בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> be-chol Every י֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> Yom Every day אֲבָרֲכֶ֑ךָּ <S%H1288><s%> 'a-va-ra-Che-ka; will I bless וַאֲהַלְלָ֥ה <S%H1984><s%> va-'a-hal-Lah thee and I will praise שִׁ֝מְךָ֗ <S%H8034><s%> me-Cha, thy name לְעוֹלָ֥ם <S%H5769><s%> le-'o-Lam for ever וָעֶֽד׃ <S%H5703><s%> va-'Ed. and ever

גָּ֘ד֤וֹל <S%H1419><s%> ga-Dol Great יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh [is] the LORD וּמְהֻלָּ֣ל <S%H1984><s%> u-me-hul-Lal to be praised מְאֹ֑ד <S%H3966><s%> me-'Od; and greatly וְ֝לִגְדֻלָּת֗וֹ <S%H1420><s%> ve-lig-dul-la-To, and his greatness אֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> 'ein else חֵֽקֶר׃ <S%H2714><s%> Che-ker. [is] unsearchable

דּ֣וֹר <S%H1755><s%> Dor One לְ֭דוֹר <S%H1755><s%> Le-dor generation יְשַׁבַּ֣ח <S%H7623><s%> ye-shab-Bach shall praise מַעֲשֶׂ֑יךָ <S%H4639><s%> ma-'a-Sei-cha; thy works וּגְב֖וּרֹתֶ֣יךָ <S%H1369><s%> u-ge-Vu-ro-Tei-cha thy mighty acts יַגִּֽידוּ׃ <S%H5046><s%> yag-Gi-du. to another and shall declare

הֲ֭דַר <S%H1926><s%> Ha-dar honour כְּב֣וֹד <S%H3519><s%> ke-Vod of the glorious הוֹדֶ֑ךָ <S%H1935><s%> ho-De-cha; of thy majesty וְדִבְרֵ֖י <S%H1697><s%> ve-div-Rei works נִפְלְאוֹתֶ֣יךָ <S%H6381><s%> nif-le-'o-Tei-cha and of thy wondrous אָשִֽׂיחָה׃ <S%H7878><s%> 'a-Si-chah. I will speak

וֶעֱז֣וּז <S%H5807><s%> ve-'e-Zuz of the might נוֹרְאֹתֶ֣יךָ <S%H3372><s%> nor-'o-Tei-cha of thy terrible acts יֹאמֵ֑רוּ <S%H559><s%> yo-Me-ru; And [men] shall speak; וּגְדוּלֹּתֶיךָ u-ge-dul-lo-tei-cha כוּגְדוּלָּתְךָ֥ <S%H1420><s%> u-ge-dul-la-te-Cha dignity קאֲסַפְּרֶֽנָּה׃ <S%H5608><s%> 'a-sap-pe-Ren-nah. and I will declare

זֵ֣כֶר <S%H2143><s%> Ze-cher the memory רַב־ <S%H7227><s%> rav- of thy great טוּבְךָ֣ <S%H2898><s%> tu-ve-Cha goodness יַבִּ֑יעוּ <S%H5042><s%> yab-Bi-'u; They shall abundantly utter וְצִדְקָתְךָ֥ <S%H6666><s%> ve-tzid-ka-te-Cha of thy righteousness יְרַנֵּֽנוּ׃ <S%H7442><s%> ye-ran-Ne-nu. and shall sing

חַנּ֣וּן <S%H2587><s%> chan-Nun [is] gracious וְרַח֣וּם <S%H7349><s%> ve-ra-Chum and full of compassion יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; The LORD אֶ֥רֶךְ <S%H750><s%> 'E-rech slow אַ֝פַּ֗יִם <S%H639><s%> 'ap-Pa-yim, to anger וּגְדָל־ <S%H1419><s%> u-ge-dol- and of great חָֽסֶד׃ <S%H2617><s%> Cha-sed. mercy

טוֹב־ <S%H2896><s%> tov- [is] good יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh The LORD לַכֹּ֑ל <S%H3605><s%> lak-Kol; to all וְ֝רַחֲמָ֗יו <S%H7356><s%> ve-ra-cha-Mav, to all and his tender mercies עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- are over כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all מַעֲשָֽׂיו׃ <S%H4639><s%> ma-'a-Sav. [are] over all his works

יוֹד֣וּךָ <S%H3034><s%> yo-Du-cha shall praise יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh thee O LORD כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- All מַעֲשֶׂ֑יךָ <S%H4639><s%> ma-'a-Sei-cha; All thy works וַ֝חֲסִידֶ֗יךָ <S%H2623><s%> va-cha-si-Dei-cha, and thy saints יְבָרֲכֽוּכָה׃ <S%H1288><s%> ye-va-ra-Chu-chah. shall bless

כְּב֣וֹד <S%H3519><s%> ke-Vod of the glory מַלְכוּתְךָ֣ <S%H4438><s%> mal-chu-te-Cha of thy kingdom יֹאמֵ֑רוּ <S%H559><s%> yo-Me-ru; They shall speak וּגְבוּרָתְךָ֥ <S%H1369><s%> u-ge-vu-ra-te-Cha of thy power יְדַבֵּֽרוּ׃ <S%H1696><s%> ye-dab-Be-ru. and talk

לְהוֹדִ֤יעַ׀ <S%H3045><s%> le-ho-Di-a' To make known לִבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> liv-Nei to the sons הָ֭אָדָם <S%H120><s%> Ha-'a-dom of men גְּבוּרֹתָ֑יו <S%H1369><s%> ge-vu-ro-Tav; his mighty acts וּ֝כְב֗וֹד <S%H3519><s%> u-che-Vod, and the glorious הֲדַ֣ר <S%H1926><s%> ha-Dar majesty מַלְכוּתֽוֹ׃ <S%H4438><s%> mal-chu-To. of his kingdom

מַֽלְכוּתְךָ֗ <S%H4438><s%> mal-chu-te-Cha, Thy kingdom מַלְכ֥וּת <S%H4438><s%> mal-Chut kingdom כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all עֹֽלָמִ֑ים <S%H5769><s%> 'o-la-Mim; [is] an everlasting וּ֝מֶֽמְשֶׁלְתְּךָ֗ <S%H4475><s%> u-mem-shel-te-cha, and thy dominion בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> be-chol all דּ֥וֹר <S%H1755><s%> Dor [endureth] throughout all וָדֽוֹר׃ <S%H1755><s%> va-Dor. generations

סוֹמֵ֣ךְ <S%H5564><s%> so-Mech upholdeth יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh The LORD לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> le-chol all הַנֹּפְלִ֑ים <S%H5307><s%> han-no-fe-Lim; all that fall וְ֝זוֹקֵ֗ף <S%H2210><s%> ve-zo-Kef, and raiseth up לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> le-chol all הַכְּפוּפִֽים׃ <S%H3721><s%> hak-ke-fu-Fim. all [those that be] bowed down

עֵֽינֵי־ <S%H5869><s%> 'ei-nei- The eyes כֹ֭ל <S%H3605><s%> chol of all אֵלֶ֣יךָ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lei-cha about יְשַׂבֵּ֑רוּ <S%H7663><s%> ye-sab-Be-ru; of all wait וְאַתָּ֤ה <S%H859><s%> ve-'at-Tah and You נֽוֹתֵן־ <S%H5414><s%> no-ten- upon thee and thou givest לָהֶ֖ם <S%H1992><s%> la-Hem like אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אָכְלָ֣ם <S%H400><s%> 'a-che-Lam them their meat בְּעִתּֽוֹ׃ <S%H6256><s%> be-'it-To. in due season

פּוֹתֵ֥חַ <S%H6605><s%> po-Te-ach Thou openest אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יָדֶ֑ךָ <S%H3027><s%> ya-De-cha; thine hand וּמַשְׂבִּ֖יעַ <S%H7646><s%> u-mas-Bi-a' and satisfiest לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> le-chol of every חַ֣י <S%H2416><s%> chai of every living thing רָצֽוֹן׃ <S%H7522><s%> ra-Tzon. the desire

צַדִּ֣יק <S%H6662><s%> tzad-Dik [is] righteous יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh The LORD בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> be-chol all דְּרָכָ֑יו <S%H1870><s%> de-ra-Chav; in all his ways וְ֝חָסִ֗יד <S%H2623><s%> ve-cha-Sid, and holy בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> be-chol all מַעֲשָֽׂיו׃ <S%H4639><s%> ma-'a-Sav. in all his works

קָר֣וֹב <S%H7138><s%> ka-Rov [is] nigh יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh The LORD לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> le-chol to all קֹרְאָ֑יו <S%H7121><s%> ko-re-'Av; unto all them that call לְכֹ֤ל <S%H3605><s%> le-Chol to all אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who יִקְרָאֻ֣הוּ <S%H7121><s%> yik-ra-'U-hu upon him to all that call בֶאֱמֶֽת׃ <S%H571><s%> ve-'e-Met. upon him in truth

רְצוֹן־ <S%H7522><s%> re-tzon- the desire יְרֵאָ֥יו <S%H3373><s%> ye-re-'Av of them that fear יַעֲשֶׂ֑ה <S%H6213><s%> ya-'a-Seh; He will fulfil וְֽאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et שַׁוְעָתָ֥ם <S%H7775><s%> shav-'a-Tam their cry יִ֝שְׁמַ֗ע <S%H8085><s%> yish-Ma', him he also will hear וְיוֹשִׁיעֵֽם׃ <S%H3467><s%> ve-yo-shi-'Em. and will save

שׁוֹמֵ֣ר <S%H8104><s%> sho-Mer preserveth יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh The LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all אֹהֲבָ֑יו <S%H157><s%> 'o-ha-Vav; all them that love וְאֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all הָרְשָׁעִ֣ים <S%H7563><s%> ha-re-sha-'Im him but all the wicked יַשְׁמִֽיד׃ <S%H8045><s%> yash-Mid. will he destroy

תְּהִלַּ֥ת <S%H8416><s%> te-hil-Lat the praise יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD יְֽדַבֶּ֫ר־ <S%H1696><s%> ye-dab-Ber- shall speak פִּ֥י <S%H6310><s%> pi My mouth וִיבָרֵ֣ךְ <S%H1288><s%> vi-va-Rech bless כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- and all בָּ֭שָׂר <S%H1320><s%> Ba-sor and let all flesh שֵׁ֥ם <S%H8034><s%> shem name קָדְשׁ֗וֹ <S%H6944><s%> ka-de-Sho, his holy לְעוֹלָ֥ם <S%H5769><s%> le-'o-Lam for ever וָעֶֽד׃ <S%H5703><s%> va-'Ed. and ever
